report.title: Sinking Through the Bed
report.author: clutch
report.bodytext: It was near Christmas and my choral group was putting on a concert for some local women's club. /n /n Afterward's a friend of mine asked me if I wanted some OC's. I said sure. He sold me the Oxy for 15 dollars and threw in a free 10mg morphine tablet. /n /n He told me to take them both at the same time, he said the feeling was amazing, almost orgasmic. /n /n I drove home and at 5pm I took the morphine and snorted the oxycontin. About 15 minutes later I felt the usual opiate/narcotic laid back feeling. I am pretty experienced with opiates and narcotics having taken everything from Codeine to percocet to lortab to demerol. I also smoke top quality marijuana everyday. 30 minutes have passed and I am having trouble walking and concentrating. /n /n I want to sleep but I know it will be a waste of good pharmaceuticals. /n /n I get something to eat and try to read a book. This doesnt work so I just sit on my bed enjoying the body tingle and 'sinking through the bed' feeling. /n /n 1 hour and 30 minutes have now passed and I can barely keep my eyes open. Finally I pass out. /n /n I have some great dreams while out but they are hard to remember. Opiates give me great dreams. Sam Taylor Coleridge wrote most of his poetry under the influence of opitates. /n /n When I finally wake up several hours later I still have the laid back feeling, but nothing too great. /n /n Overall I would say it was pretty boring and way too heavy of a dose to enjoy. All I wanted to do was sleep.
